snippet.title: Live by the Sword: Tactics - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Live by the Sword: Tactics will enter Steam Early Access June 23rd, 2021. 
Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1363210/Live_by_the_Sword_Tactics/
Early Access Release Plan: https://steamcommunity.com/games/1363210/announcements/detail/3108021856556279081

Twitter: https://twitter.com/labradorstudio
